AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your Charisma score increases by an additional 1 (for a total of 2), and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

SkillProficiencyFeature.Name: Creed of the Trickster
SkillProficiencyFeature.Text: You have proficiency in the Sleight of Hand and Stealth skills.

BonusSpellKeywordChoiceFeature.Name: Cantrip
BonusSpellKeywordChoiceFeature.Text: You know one cantrip of your choice from the bard spell list. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

SubRace.Name: Cosi Merfolk
SubRace.Description: No merfolk will openly admit to following the creed of the trickster, but those who do view Cosi as an ally who can grant them control over the chaotic forces of the world.
